nodes.text: The Commando advanced training program was a training program in the Republic Special Forces Division of the Republic Military. Troopers who underwent the Commando program specialized in heavy-hitting weaponry such as assault cannons, specialized blaster weaponry, and medical technology.

The Commando is an advanced class for the trooper class in the Star Wars: The Old Republic MMO video game. This advanced class specializes in either powerful weaponry and damage, or healing other players. The Imperial counterpart for this archetype is the mercenary.
